description.value:
Dark, scaly flesh spreads over the victim's body, wracking it with excruciating pain.

Stage 0: The target is cured.
Stage 1: Initial Effect: The target loses a healing surge that it cannot regain until cured of the disease.
Stage 2: The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses and loses two healing surges that it cannot regain until cured of the disease.
Stage 3: Final State: The target recovers from the effect of screaming scalepox but becomes a loyal servant of Demogorgon.
Check: At the end of each extended rest, the target makes an Endurance check if it is at stage 1 or 2.
17 or lower: The stage of the disease increases by one.
18-22: No Change
23 or higher: The stage of the disease decreases by one.

Published in Demonomicon, page(s) 69.
